alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont; Clinton; Fayette; Highland; Ross; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN CLERMONT, NORTHWESTERN BROWN, SOUTHEASTERN WARREN, SOUTHERN FAYETTE, CLINTON, HIGHLAND AND NORTHWESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 PM EDT... At 1144 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Jeffersonville to near Morrow, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Wilmington, Loveland, Hillsboro, Greenfield, Blanchester, Mount Orab, Sabina, Lynchburg, Leesburg, New Vienna, Morrow, Russell, Woodville, Staunton, New Market, Good Hope, Frankfort, Maineville and Clarksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
